outputs.output_descr: Assist in shifting the focus of national and local Disaster Risk Reduction policies and practices from post-disaster response and recovery to comprehensive disaster risk reduction, so to increase human security and safety.

project_descr: By 2016, Disaster Risk Management framework in compliance with international standards, especially the Hyogo Framework of Action.
project_title: DISASTER MANAGEMENT FOR SUSTAINABLE HUMAN DEVELOPMENT
